name: The Artifice Engine
description: (NOTE: This project both contains flashing lights and text and is still in development, probably with some bugs to iron out. Your patience and understanding is highly appreciated!) You were once an Artificer, one who used powerful tools called Artifice Engines to combine elements together, at great risk to your mental stability. Now that the practice has been vilified and all Artifice Engines have been outlawed, you stand alone in practicing the craft, desperate to complete one final round of synthesis to attempt to fix the biggest mistake of your life before you leave your Artifice Engine behind, or worse: before it leaves you.
